SELECT DISTINCT P.P_ID, P.P_TITLE, P.P_ADDRESS, P.P_CHECKOUT, P.P_CHECKIN, P.P_REFUND, A.ROOM_PRICE, A.ROOM_TYPE, A.ROOM_OPTION FROM PROPERTIES P, P_ROOMTYPE A, P_EXTRA B WHERE P.P_ID = A.P_ID AND P.P_ID = B.P_ID
AND P_ADDRESS LIKE '%${P_ADDRESS}%'

SELECT DISTINCT P.P_ID, P.P_TITLE, P.P_ADDRESS, P.P_CHECKOUT, P.P_CHECKIN, P.P_REFUND, A.ROOM_PRICE, A.ROOM_TYPE, A.ROOM_OPTION FROM PROPERTIES P, P_ROOMTYPE A WHERE P.P_ID = A.P_ID
AND P_ADDRESS LIKE '%${P_ADDRESS}%'
ORDER BY A.ROOM_PRICE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT P.P_ID, P.P_TITLE, P.P_ADDRESS, P.P_CHECKOUT, P.P_CHECKIN, P.P_REFUND, A.ROOM_PRICE, A.ROOM_TYPE, A.ROOM_OPTION FROM PROPERTIES P, P_ROOMTYPE A WHERE P.P_ID = A.P_ID
AND P_ADDRESS LIKE '%${P_ADDRESS}%'
ORDER BY A.ROOM_PRICE DESC
